title: Thanksgiving: Don't Eat This Turkey!
description: Children's Book: Thanksgiving: Don't Eat This Turkey! Bedtime Stories for Kids  It's Thanksgiving day and guess what yummy food is on the menu? Turkey, of course! But Sammy tries to save the turkey from being eaten. Will this little red bird succeed? Read the book to find out!  This is a read aloud kids book and is easy to read. The target age range audience is for toddlers, preschool and young children.  This is a book that any child will love, especially at bedtime. It is suitable for parents to read to their children. Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren.  Read this children's book FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership!
author: V. Moua
